pull.title: [qa] test_framework: Append portseed to tmpdir
pull.body:
This makes it possible to specify a tmpdir while running tests in
parallel.

events.message:
[qa] test_framework: Append portseed to tmpdir

This makes it possible to specify a tmpdir while running tests in
parallel

issue.title: Test framework: only cleanup on successful test runs

events.body: How about a '.' in the name to separate dirname and port_seed, rather than a '/' for a new directory?  Seems like tab-completion would work better that way.

@sdaftuar Can you explain how this helps tab-completion? I fail to see the difference in the '.' vs '/'.

Also, this would mean to adjust the `--tmpdir` help to `help="Path prefix for datadirs. (portseed is appended to the prefix)"`.

@MarcoFalke  Ah I hadn't thought about the --tmpdir argument requiring us to use space inside that directory tree, that's a fair point.  I was just thinking that I have to press [tab] one extra time to tab-complete to a subdirectory, maybe that's unique to my shell/environment, but not a big deal.

ACK

issue.title: [qa] Cleanup doesn't get top level directory
issue.body:
I think after #8098, the cleanup that happens at the end of an rpc test no longer deletes the temp datadir created by default.  (I have a whole bunch of directories in /tmp/ now that I didn't use to have, so I think that's the cause...)

Would be nice for cleanup to work as it used to, at least in the situation where no datadir is being passed in as an argument.

issue.title: Backport migration from rpc-tests.sh to rpc-tests.py
issue.body:
Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6567
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6523
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6616
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6788
  - Only the commit fixing `rpc-tests.py`
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6791

- bitcoin/bitcoin#6827

  - Only the first commit.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8098

- bitcoin/bitcoin#8133
  - Only the `rpc-tests.py` commit.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8066
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8216
  - Only the last two commits.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8254

- bitcoin/bitcoin#8482

- bitcoin/bitcoin#8551

- bitcoin/bitcoin#8625

- bitcoin/bitcoin#9098
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9276
  - Excluding the second commit (we don't have the changes it requires).
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9657
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9807
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9766
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9823
